title: Bug 116564: Title of hyperlink builder changes with settings
OB: When clicking on the 'OK' button and then reopening the hyperlink builder, the actual result is that the title of the hyperlink builder becomes 'www.actuate.com'.
EB: The expected result is that the title of the hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options' regardless of the settings.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:

1. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'.
2. Click on the 'OK' button.
3. Reopen the hyperlink builder and observe the title.
